DAO - package DAO
 
databaseName - Static variable in class helper.JDBC
 
datePickerAppointmentEndDate - Variable in class controller.Appointments
Date Picker for selecting the end date of an appointment.

Date Picker for selecting an appointment start date.
deleteAppointment(int) - Static method in class DAO.AppointmentDAO
Deletes an appointment from the appointments table by its Appointment_ID.
deleteContact(int) - Static method in class DAO.ContactDAO
Deletes a contact from the contacts table by its Contact_ID.
deleteCustomer(int) - Static method in class DAO.CustomerDAO
Deletes the customer record from the database associated with the provided unique ID.
deleteUser(int) - Static method in class DAO.UserDAO
Deletes a user from the Users table by its User_ID.
description - Variable in class model.Appointment
The description of the appointment.
displayAggregateReportByContactAndQuarter() - Method in class controller.Reports
Displays an aggregate report for the number of appointments by contact and quarter.
displayAggregateReportByTypeAndMonth() - Method in class controller.Reports
Displays an aggregate report for the number of appointments by type and month.
displayAppointmentsForInput(int) - Method in class controller.Reports
Displays the appropriate appointments-based report based on the report ID, either for appointments by contact ID or for appointments by customer ID.
displayUpcomingAppointments() - Method in class controller.Reports
Displays appointments within the next 15 minutes for the current user.
Division - Class in model
Represents a division with an ID, name, and associated country ID.
Division(int, String, int) - Constructor for class model.Division
Constructs a Division with an ID, name, and country ID.

Handles data access operations for division data.
